3FE92869.Line5.11EA0F: Ah, you see now, the leaves and stems should only be used raw. If they're cooked...

67657E98.Line3.11EA16: What about the leaves and stems?

8EE1D4E5.Line1.11EA0F: Pay attention. You never use berries and roots raw, they're poisonous.

DF1800B2.VoiceDir1.11EA0F: Eager and down to earth. Clearly loves his work and teaching
